title: ChatGPT- 4: How to Use? New Features, Availability and more
author: Karan Singh Manral

data.children: ChatGPT- 4 has arrived, confirming the longtime rumors around its improvements to the predecessor OpenAI's ChatGPT- 3

In the realm of artificial intelligence, Language Models (LMs) have undergone transformative evolution, enabling unprecedented human-machine interaction. This evolution is evident in the progression from early Generative Pre-trained Transformers (GPT) to advanced models like GPT-3.5 and the groundbreaking ChatGPT-4. In this exploration, we will journey through the key concepts of GPT, Large Language Models (LLMs), Natural Language Processing (NLP), and dissect the notable differences between GPT 3.5 and its successor, ChatGPT-4.
Understanding Language Models (LMs) and NLP

Language Models are algorithms designed to comprehend and generate human-like text based on the patterns they learn from vast datasets. Natural Language Processing (NLP), a branch of AI, focuses on the interaction between computers and human languages. LLMs, a subset of NLP, are distinguished by their scale, capable of processing vast amounts of text data, allowing them to understand and generate contextually relevant text.
The Rise of GPT Series

children.children: The GPT series, pioneered by OpenAI, began with GPT. It introduced the concept of pre-training, where the model learns from a diverse dataset before fine-tuning for specific tasks. GPT's ability to generate coherent and contextually relevant text marked a significant milestone in the field of NLP.

GPT-3, the third iteration, raised the bar with its colossal scale, featuring 175 billion parameters. Its immense size enabled it to perform a wide array of tasks, from language translation to code generation. GPT-3 showcased the potential of large-scale LMs in real-world applications.

data.children: ChatGPT- 4

Compared to it's predecessors, ChatGPT- 4 generates safer and more helpful responses, according to OpenAI, making it the company's most sophisticated system. This article will tell you all you need to know about it, including how to use it and what it can accomplish.

data.children: ChatGPT- 4: How to use?

The simplest way to get started with GPT-4 today is to use it in Bing Chat. Microsoft revealed that it has been using GPT-4 in its free Bing Chat service. However, some GPT-4 features, such as visual input, are not available in Bing Chat. You will, however, continue to have access to the expanded LLM (large language model) and the advanced intelligence that it brings. Despite being free, Bing Chat has a cap of 15 chats per session and 150 sessions per day. Right now, the only other way to gain access to GPT-4 is to upgrade to ChatGPT Plus. To upgrade to the $20 paid subscription, simply click “Upgrade to Plus” in ChatGPT's sidebar.

You'll be able to switch between GPT-4 and older versions of the LLM once you've entered your credit card information. You can even double-check that you're getting GPT-4 responses because they have a black logo rather than the green logo used by older models. Using GPT-4 after that is the same as using ChatGPT Plus with GPT-3.5. It's more powerful than ChatGPT and allows you to fine-tune a dataset to get tailored results that match your requirements.
ChatGPT- 4: What's new?

GPT-4 is an OpenAI language model that can generate text that is similar to human speech. It advances ChatGPT's technology, which is currently based on GPT-3.5. GPT stands for Generative Pre-trained Transformer, a deep learning technology that writes like a human using artificial neural networks.

This next-generation language model, according to OpenAI, is more advanced in three key areas: creativity, visual input, and longer context. GPT-4, according to OpenAI, is much better at both creating and collaborating with users on creative projects. Music, screenplays, technical writing, and even “learning a user's writing style” are examples of these.

This is also influenced by the larger context. GPT-4 can now handle up to 25,000 words of user text. You can also simply send GPT-4 a web link and instruct it to interact with the text on that page. According to OpenAI, this can help with the creation of long-form content as well as “extended conversations.”

GPT-4 can now receive images as a starting point for interaction. The chatbot is shown an image of a few baking ingredients and asked what can be made with them in the example provided on the GPT-4 website. It is currently unknown whether video can also be used in this manner.

Finally, OpenAI claims that GPT-4 is far safer to use than the previous generation. In OpenAI's internal testing, it reportedly produces 40% more factual responses while being 82% less likely to “respond to requests for disallowed content.”
To make these advances, OpenAI claims to have been trained with human feedback, claiming to have worked with “over 50 experts for early feedback in domains including AI safety and security.”

Users have been posting some of the amazing things they've done with it in the weeks since it's launch, including inventing new languages, detailing how to escape into the real world, and creating complex animations for apps from scratch. We're starting to learn what it's capable of as the first users flock to get their hands on it. Using a combination of HTML and JavaScript, one user reportedly used GPT-4 to quickly produce a playable Pong game.
The Essence of GPT 3.5 vs. ChatGPT-4

children.children: GPT-3.5, with its vast parameters, demonstrated exceptional versatility. It could understand context, generate human-like responses, and perform tasks that required nuanced understanding. However, its limitations became evident in tasks demanding deeper comprehension and multi-turn interactions.

Enter ChatGPT-4, a leap forward in the GPT series. While maintaining the versatility of its predecessors, ChatGPT-4 excels in multi-turn conversations. It retains context across several interactions, making it ideal for interactive storytelling, educational dialogue, and collaborative problem-solving. Additionally, it supports rich formatting, interactive elements, and domain specialization, enhancing its adaptability.

data.children: The Nuances of ChatGPT-4

children.children: ChatGPT-4's understanding of multi-turn conversations marks a paradigm shift. It remembers and references previous messages accurately, leading to more coherent and contextually rich dialogues. This ability opens doors to interactive learning, brainstorming, and dynamic storytelling.

ChatGPT-4's support for rich text formatting and interactive elements enhances user experience. It can generate content with varied styles and include interactive components, making it suitable for creating engaging tutorials, interactive websites, and dynamic applications.

ChatGPT-4's fine-tuning capabilities enable domain specialization. By tailoring the model to specific industries or fields, it can provide accurate and relevant responses. This makes it invaluable in sectors like healthcare, finance, and legal, where precision is paramount.

One of ChatGPT-4's most significant strengths lies in collaborative problem-solving. It fosters creativity, aids in brainstorming sessions, and enhances teamwork. Remote teams can leverage its capabilities for ideation, project planning, and innovation, breaking down geographical barriers.

data.children: Does Bing Chat use ChatGPT 4?

According to Microsoft, the new Bing, or Bing Chat, is more powerful than ChatGPT. Because OpenAI's chat employs GPT-3.5, there was speculation at the time that Bing Chat might be using GPT-4. Microsoft has recently verified that Bing Chat is based on GPT-4.
Although capabilities like visual input weren't offered on Bing Chat, it is still unclear which specific functions have been included and which have not.
But, compared to ChatGPT, which can only use the training it got up until 2021, Bing Chat definitely represents an improvement in that it can now get current information via the internet.
The Impact on Industries and Society

The evolution from GPT to ChatGPT-4 signifies a significant leap in AI capabilities. Industries such as healthcare, education, customer service, and content creation benefit from ChatGPT-4's nuanced understanding and interactive abilities. Its impact extends to education, where personalized tutoring and interactive learning modules enhance student engagement and understanding. In healthcare, it aids in diagnostics, patient education, and research, bridging gaps in medical knowledge dissemination.

Moreover, ChatGPT-4's ability to support rich formatting and interactive content influences user experiences in web development, application design, and online education. Its role in shaping the future of human-machine collaboration is profound, opening avenues for innovative applications and societal advancement.
Conclusion

In the landscape of AI, the journey from GPT to ChatGPT-4 mirrors the rapid evolution of language models and NLP technologies. ChatGPT-4, with its multi-turn conversation capabilities, rich formatting support, and domain specialization, stands as a testament to the potential of AI in reshaping how we interact with technology. As it finds its way into various facets of our lives and work, the boundaries of what is achievable with AI continue to expand. With ChatGPT-4, we stand on the precipice of a new era, where human-machine collaboration reaches unprecedented heights, driving innovation, enhancing creativity, and shaping a future where AI augments human potential in ways previously unimaginable.
